TopicTitle: Tutorial Videos about USING different Mods [EN/DE] (not how to develope them!)

Articles.Content:
Hi.

I want to introduce a set of Tutorials in English and German language.

My english is lightyears far away from being good My spoken english skills are not really good. I did not practice speaking english for a long time now. But I will come into it again...dont worrie^^

I hope the quality of my english is good enough and the overall quality is okay.

Before I post the Link to the Playlist-Container which has actually 4 playlists (2 english and 2 german tutorial series). I want to say that I record the stuff in German language and then record and synchronise it with english audio.

I tried to keep the timing at the point. But it of course is not 100% correct and so for it has some parts in the video where I had some spoken pause where no pause should be...same for mouse movement.

I wanted to upload more stuff today...but as it is a pain in the arse to edit and mux audio content with Cubase, Eidus (I accidentely overwrite a save in Eidus...so I had to demux and re-mux the audio again to not being used to encode the already encoded video (quality-wise)). But now that Im in the flow of using the programs (long time ago that I used them^^) it should be easy going.

Ok..here we go:

https://www.youtube.com/user/Duke49th/videos?shelf_id=9&view=50&sort=dd

(More Videos coming up in the next few days..I hope to upload at least 1-2 videos in both languages everyday.)

Comments would be nice. And please keep in mind...Im german, not an english language native. And in the next videos I will probably record each video in both languages individual. So the sync is not a question anymore.

If you completely hate it...tell me.

P.s.: Sorry for the microphone-touching sounds in the english video. Got no microphone stand right now so I needed to hold it in my hands...but it shouldn't be too noisy at all...but its noticeable so why I mentioned an apologize for that.

Edited December 9, 2013 by Duke-49th
Sorry for the delay. Got problems with my hardware...later with my software..I solved it. But for tonight its too late. I will upload the stuff tomorrow.
